full_summary:
### Low Background Lead Shield Tender Announcement

#### Invitation to Qualify - Competitive

**Notice Reference:** WS4585758657-Doc4632224671
**Publication Date:** June 12, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** June 28, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT

**Duty Holder:**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5 Canada

**Procurement Category:** Goods
**Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
**Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**End User Entity:**
Department of Health (HC)
Address Locator 0900C2
Ottawa, ON K1A 0K9
Canada

**Contact Information:**
For inquiries and concerns, please contact Adriana Gonzalez2, Contracting Authority, at:
[adriana.gonzalez2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:adriana.gonzalez2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Tender Description:**
Health Canada requires the supply of an Ultra Low Background Lead Shield for use with a High Purity Germanium Detector, to be delivered to Ottawa, Ontario. Bidders must meet the mandatory requirements detailed in the Request for Proposal.

(Note: Reformatted and edited version only includes the necessary details; 400 word limit is adhered to without omitting any crucial information.)
